works.description: Since the concept of modular KitchenScape appliances has been thought of by a firm that has given us the Xbox 360 and the Boxee Box, the chances are high that we may see it for real someday soon. Conceptualized by San Francisco-based Astro Studios, the modular KitchenScape range includes kitchen appliances that dock together, thereby saving a lot of space and minimizing the clutter of tangled cords.
